titleStmt.title: An exposition vpon the Lords prayer Deliuered in certaine sermons, in the cathedrall church of S. Paul. By Henry King Archdeacon of Colchester, and residentiary of the same church.
titleStmt.author: King, Henry, 1592-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland, and are to be sold by Iohn Partridge in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
